sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Collective Audience Enters Equity Purchase Agreement with NYIAX
feed.summary: Collective Audience (CAUD) has entered into an Equity Purchase Agreement with NYIAX, Inc., under which NYIAX will acquire BeOp and DSL Digital LLC making them wholly-owned subsidiaries. In return, Collective Audience and Gregg Greenberg will receive shares representing 49% of NYIAX’s common stock. This transaction is expected to enhance NYIAX’s market position by integrating the capabilities of BeOp and DSL.

feed.title: Collective Audience's CA Europe Strengthens Senior Leadership Team with Key Appointments
feed.summary: Collective Audience Europe (CA Europe) has significantly strengthened its senior leadership team with the appointments of Jean-Michel Lopes as Europe Chief Revenue Officer, François Boisson as Sales Manager, and the promotion of Romain Cauchois to Managing Director of Europe. These strategic hires and promotions are intended to drive the company's expansion across the European market, enhance its innovative advertising solutions, and further its leadership in the Open Web. The new team leaders are expected to foster dynamic connections between brands and audiences while focusing on authentic, privacy-first experiences.

feed.title: Collective Audience Appoints Digital Marketing Executive, Sean McCormick, to Advisor Collective
feed.summary: Collective Audience has appointed Sean McCormick, a digital marketing executive with over 20 years of experience, to its Advisor Collective. McCormick will contribute his expertise in digital lead generation, data marketing, and monetization to help transform the AdTech, MarTech, and digital media industries. His focus will be on leveraging data-driven strategies and AI-powered automation in a privacy-first environment.

feed.title: Collective Audience Begins Next Phase of Global Expansion With Launch of Collective Audience Europe
feed.summary: Collective Audience, Inc. (OTC:CAUD) has launched Collective Audience Europe (CA Europe), a new division aimed at expanding its leading audience-based performance advertising and media solutions into the European market. This strategic move follows the acquisition of BeOp's conversational AdTech platform and targets Europe's rapidly growing digital advertising market. CA Europe will leverage its AI-driven platform to empower European advertisers and publishers with cutting-edge tools and data technology for the Open Web.

feed.title: AdTech Market: Trends, Innovations, and Growth Outlook 2032
feed.summary: The global AdTech market, valued at USD 953.91 billion in 2023, is projected to reach USD 3,421.29 billion by 2032, growing at a CAGR of 15.25%. This growth is driven by the shift to digital advertising, demand for personalized experiences, and key segments like on-premise deployment and large enterprises dominating the market. North America is currently the largest market shareholder, while Asia-Pacific is expected to be the fastest-growing region.

feed.title: Collective Audience to Report Record Pro Forma Revenue for Q3 2024; Provides 2025 Growth Outlook
feed.summary: Collective Audience, Inc. (CAUD) expects to report record pro forma revenue of approximately $1.8 million for Q3 2024, a 65% increase from the previous quarter, driven by acquisitions of DSL Digital and BeOp. The company anticipates further revenue gains and positive adjusted EBITDA for Q4 2024 and projects over 80% revenue growth in 2025 due to new product offerings and potential acquisitions. This growth is also fueled by their unique positioning to benefit from new consumer privacy regulations in the advertising industry.

feed.title: Collective Audience CEO, Peter Bordes, Appointed to Symitri’s All-Star Board of Digital Tech Executives and Investors
feed.summary: Peter Bordes, CEO of Collective Audience, Inc. (NASDAQ-GM:CAUD), has been appointed to the board of directors of Symitri, a company pioneering integrated privacy firewall and real-time data cleanroom technology for the open web. Bordes, a seasoned entrepreneur and investor with over 30 years of experience, joins other tech executives and investors, Keith Bank and Jeff White, to guide Symitri's mission of balancing open internet advertising with consumer privacy. Symitri's solution enables deterministic identity connections for media buyers and sellers without exposing personal data, aiming to provide a sustainable model for the ad-supported internet.

feed.title: Collective Audience Receives Nasdaq Notifications Regarding Continued Listing Requirements
feed.summary: Collective Audience, Inc. received two notifications from Nasdaq regarding continued listing requirements: one for failing to file its Form 10-K for fiscal year 2023 on time and another for not meeting the minimum bid price requirement. The company has until June 24, 2024, to submit a plan for the 10-K and until October 16, 2024, to regain compliance with the bid price rule. CEO Peter Bordes attributes the 10-K delay to a lengthy de-SPAC transaction and expresses confidence in the company's refocused strategy and recent developments to regain compliance.

feed.title: Collective Audience and Reset Digital Launch Strategic AdTech Joint Venture
feed.summary: Collective Audience and Reset Digital have launched a strategic AdTech joint venture to empower marketers with direct connections between supply and demand, aiming to increase efficiency, reach, ad spend ROI, and audience data assets. This partnership integrates Reset Digital's Neuro-Programmatic™ platform with Collective Audience's AudienceDesk™ powered by AudienceCloud™ platform, leveraging emotional AI and feelings-based data for more meaningful consumer engagement. The collaboration is expected to expand Reset Digital's U.S. market share and generate significant revenue for Collective Audience, while also exploring possibilities for shared ownership.

feed.title: Collective Audience CEO and Chairman Discuss the Rapidly Evolving AdTech Industry in Interview by Veteran Broadcaster, Jane King, at Nasdaq MarketSite
feed.summary: Collective Audience CEO Peter Bordes and Chairman Joe Zawadzki were interviewed at Nasdaq MarketSite, discussing growth opportunities in the AdTech market. They detailed Collective Audience's strategy to address market inefficiencies through an open digital advertising ecosystem and a "rising tide, building blocks" model involving acquisitions and joint ventures to drive exponential growth and shareholder value.

feed.title: Why Is Collective Audience (CAUD) Stock Up 37% Today?
feed.summary: Collective Audience (CAUD) stock is experiencing a significant surge, rising 37% today with heavy trading volume, despite a lack of specific news from the marketing company. The company only went public earlier this month through a SPAC merger and saw a 29.7% gain on Friday, indicating continued investor interest in the newly listed stock.

feed.title: Collective Audience Issues Shares to Logiq for Special Dividend Distribution of Shares
feed.summary: Collective Audience, Inc. has issued 3,762,000 shares of its common stock to Logiq, Inc. for a special dividend distribution to Logiq stockholders following a business combination. Both companies caution stockholders about brokerage firms prematurely crediting dividend shares, as no shares have been delivered to Logiq shareholders yet. Logiq is investigating reports of erroneous credits and sales, which could lead to failures to deliver upon trade settlement.

feed.title: CAUD - Collective Audience, Inc. Latest Stock News & Market Updates
feed.summary: This page provides news and analysis for Collective Audience (CAUD), a company offering AI-driven AdTech solutions in programmatic advertising. It covers strategic developments, technological advancements, and market positioning, including acquisitions, earnings reports, and partnerships. The site helps track CAUD's integration of zero-party data solutions, AI optimization tools, and cross-channel advertising innovations.
